refnamediv.refpurpose: a light-weight program to configure keyboard and mouse

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the lxinput command.
lxinput is a program to configure keyboard and mouse for desktop, usually for LXDE.
